dbprofile.sql:
SELECT COUNT(post.id) as _total FROM post WHERE post.status='1' LIMIT 1 SELECT post.id FROM post WHERE post.status='1' ORDER BY post.createtime DESC LIMIT 0,20 SELECT *, post.id AS _post__id, tag.id AS _tag__id, tag.id, post.status AS _post__status, tag.status AS _tag__status, post_tag.tag_id, post_tag.post_id ,post_tag.tag_id AS _tag__post_id ,post_tag.post_id AS _post__tag_id FROM post
LEFT OUTER JOIN post_tag ON post.id = post_tag.post_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tag ON tag.id = post_tag.tag_id WHERE post.status='1' AND post.id IN (10448847,10448846,10448845,10448844,10448843,10448842,10448841,10448840,10448839)
ORDER BY post.createtime DESC, tag.name ASC, post_tag.tag_id,post_tag.post_id ASC
